attributes.action: The National Remembrance Holiday - bank holiday in November
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/remembermonday/

Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
